column4: Hi everyone, got a weird problem.  Whenever I try to hit backspace in my terminal when there's nothing left to backspace on the line it puts 'g'
Which is really annoying.  Any way to fix it?
Is any of your keys "stuck", CTRL+G typically represents the backspace.
whenever I hit backspace when it's there's nothing left to backspace, it does the backspace thing...yes
